question: Shock lung is better known as?
exp: ANSWER: (D) ARDSREF: Robbin s pathology 7th ed p. 700 Radiology of chest diseases By Sebastian Lange, Geraldine Walsh, Geraldine Walsh, P321, http://www. ncbi. nlm. nih. gov./pubmedhealth/PMH0001164/Synonyms of Acute respiratory distress syndrome are: Non-cardiogenic pulmonary edema. Increased-permeability pulmonary edema. Stiff lung. Shock lung. ARDSAcute lung injury
